metadata.name: Tutorial NPCs - Elena and Thomas
metadata.description: Tutorial: Elena (Innkeeper) offers Social work, Thomas (Foreman) offers Physical work
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

npcs.name: Elena
npcs.description: The innkeeper, efficient and observant, managing the evening crowd with practiced ease. She wipes down tables while watching travelers settle in for the night.
npcs.personality: Practical but warm. Takes care of travelers. Has seen many road-worn wanderers stumble through her door.

npcs.name: Thomas
npcs.description: A warehouse foreman sitting at a corner table, looking for labor help with tonight's shipment. Direct, no-nonsense, pays fair for honest work.
npcs.personality: Straightforward and business-minded. Always needs capable hands. Values hard work over idle conversation.

npcs.name: General Merchant
npcs.description: A traveling merchant with various goods for sale. Practical equipment for travelers and adventurers.
npcs.personality: Business-minded and efficient. Knows the value of good equipment.
